snippet: The producers of a Mexico City production of Eve Ensler’s play will bring it to the Westside Theater in Manhattan, where the original ran for 1,381 performances.
abstract: The producers of a Mexico City production of Eve Ensler’s play will bring it to the Westside Theater in Manhattan, where the original ran for 1,381 performances.

headline.main: Spanish-Language 'Vagina Monologues' to Play at Westside Theater
